Articles.Content:
What moments have you had where you thought "My $deity, this game is beautiful"? I had a few near Jool, screenshots soon to come.

Please post screenies!

Isn't that what the awesome pictures thread is for? Have a look in fanworks.

Edited January 25, 2014 by Tw1

Even thou I've been playing for around a year now, I still find myself going "ooooo, that's purty" while just orbiting Kerbin! And each planet has different appeal, I love how small the sun seems when you're far out.

There is a thread for awesome pictures, but (as a point of some dispute) it has been moved from GD to the Fan works section of the forum - awesome pictures thread
Frankly it's a rare mission were I don't pause and think "Good grief, this is beautiful." I fear much hard drive space has been used on random screenshots!
Really? Oops! I'm rarely in that section. Any random mod may close this.
